snippet: Love, a three-time All-Star who figures to be a coveted free agent in 2015 or 2016, improved his standing with a spectacular February for the Minnesota Timberwolves.
lead_paragraph: Love, a three-time All-Star who figures to be a coveted free agent in 2015 or 2016, improved his standing with a spectacular February for the Minnesota Timberwolves.

headline.main: Kevin Love Continues to Put Up Big Numbers
headline.print_headline: Love Continues to Put Up Big Numbers
